patthana8.72:4.1: Naniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana8.72:5.1: Naaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.72:6.1: Naniyatañca naaniyatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana8.72:7.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.
